io.spine.server.model

Class AbstractHandlerMethod<T,M extends io.spine.type.MessageClass,C extends com.google.protobuf.Message,R extends MethodResult>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.model.AbstractHandlerMethod<T,M,C,R>
  • Type Parameters:
    M - the type of the message class
    C - the type of the message context or Empty if a context parameter is never used
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    HandlerMethod<T,M,C,R>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommandAcceptingMethod, EventApplier, EventReactorMethod, EventSubscriberMethod, RejectionReactorMethod, RejectionSubscriberMethod

    public abstract class AbstractHandlerMethod<T,M extends io.spine.type.MessageClass,C extends com.google.protobuf.Message,R extends MethodResult>
extends java.lang.Object
implements HandlerMethod<T,M,C,R>
    An abstract base for wrappers over methods handling messages.

    Two message handlers are equivalent when they refer to the same method on the same object (not class).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AbstractHandlerMethod.Factory<H extends HandlerMethod>
      The base class for factory objects that can filter Method objects that represent handler methods and create corresponding HandlerMethod instances that wrap those methods.

      Creates a new instance to wrap method on target.

      • getFullName

        public java.lang.String getFullName()
        Returns a full name of the handler method.

        The full name consists of a fully qualified class name of the target object and the method name separated with a dot character.

        Returns:
        full name of the subscriber
